title: B O T S
body: In ARAM there is an increasing amount of bots which i understand would irritate people in ARAM, but now in even bloody normal games there are bots. Not as frequently, but i just recetnly played with an Akali on my team that was obviously botting, and I'm sick to death of it, because it just ruins the game for everyone. I was playing Yasuo and I was pretty proud of myself, as i was going about 10/4 which isn't bad for me since I'm trash at him. Then our Akali feeds their Diana jungle so hard she one shots everyone (even our rek'sai) and we found it very hard to outplay her. Even then we kept on defending and winning teamfights, which theoretically should've won the the game, our Akali just died over and over and we lost. Hell, she was such a bad bot she didn't even enter the jungle once!

replies.body: aram is pretty much dead now tbh.
I feel so sad for you getting one bot when I have 4 on my team.
yeah it sucks worse on aram but i dont really play it :/
